scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "npm --workspace apps/api run start:dev" "npm --workspace apps/web run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace apps/api run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "npm --workspace apps/api run start:prod" "npm --workspace apps/web run start"
